+0000","feedId":44,"bgimg":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/da/Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-1-Version-3.jpg/aid138468-v4-728px-Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-1-Version-3.jpg","linkMd5":"5f65b5e4708bcefb8ab4b1db89410735","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn56@2020_3/2021/08/15/03-53-24-601_c40aff34cc0a39d0.webp","destWidth":728,"destHeight":546,"sourceBytes":65082,"destBytes":32998,"author":"","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/da/Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-1-Version-3.jpg/aid138468-v4-728px-Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-1-Version-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn56@2020_3/2021/08/15/03-53-24-601_c40aff34cc0a39d0.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/03/Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-2-Version-3.jpg/aid138468-v4-728px-Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-2-Version-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn70@2020_5/2021/08/15/03-53-29-981_3996c1130cd0b886.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/31/Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-3-Version-3.jpg/aid138468-v4-728px-Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-3-Version-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn42@2020_3/2021/08/15/03-53-30-020_979e879b8d0a3331.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/1d/Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-4-Version-3.jpg/aid138468-v4-728px-Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-4-Version-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn58@2020_1/2021/08/15/03-53-31-355_d3a84ca6d1ea0eff.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/4a/Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-5-Version-2.jpg/aid138468-v4-728px-Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-5-Version-2.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn1@2020_5/2021/08/15/03-53-30-408_39108440c62cb1df.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c0/Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-6-Version-2.jpg/aid138468-v4-728px-Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-6-Version-2.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn58@2020_2/2021/08/15/03-53-31-879_4f115ac6b9350604.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c5/Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-7-Version-2.jpg/aid138468-v4-728px-Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-7-Version-2.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn42@2020_4/2021/08/15/03-53-32-523_6e265e12a36a4387.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/08/Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-8-Version-2.jpg/aid138468-v4-728px-Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-8-Version-2.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn54@2020_4/2021/08/15/03-53-30-380_217da78c6e5e921a.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/05/Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-9-Version-2.jpg/aid138468-v4-728px-Calibrate-Binoculars-Step-9-Version-2.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn53@2020_6/2021/08/15/03-53-31-773_1294fbd7245e859f.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1628999590203},{"createdTime":"2021-08-15 11:53:10","updatedTime":"2021-08-15 11:53:10","title":"How to Make Your Eyelashes Naturally Longer","link":"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer","description":"<div class=\"mw-parser-output\">\n <p>If you’d like naturally longer, fuller lashes, it can be hard to figure out what products and lifestyle changes actually work. Thankfully, there are some natural ways you can promote lash growth and prevent breakage for longer, thicker lashes. Try incorporating a few of these methods into your beauty routine to see results in as little as one month. </p> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer&amp;action=edit&amp;section=1\" title=\"Edit section: Steps\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Steps\">Steps</span></h2> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer&amp;action=edit&amp;section=2\" title=\"Edit section: Which products help your eyelashes grow?\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span id=\"Which-products-help-your-eyelashes-grow?\"></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Which-products-help-your-eyelashes-grow.3F\">Which products help your eyelashes grow?</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Lash serum can help your eyelashes grow. Pick out a lash serum from your local beauty supply store. Swipe it on at night to prolong the growth cycle (anagen phase) of your lash hairs. You’ll probably see results in about one month, so keep at it!<sup id=\"_ref-1\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 1\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer#_note-1\">[1]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-1-Version-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Your Eyelashes Naturally Longer Step 1 Version 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/80/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-1-Version-5.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-1-Version-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Look for a lash serum with biotin in it for best results. It’s a B vitamin that’s good for your hair, skin, nails, and lashes.<sup id=\"_ref-2\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 2\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer#_note-2\">[2]</a></sup></li> \n    <li>While some mascaras may claim they help eyelashes grow, a lash serum is the only product that will actually help.</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer&amp;action=edit&amp;section=3\" title=\"Edit section: Do oils help your eyelashes grow?\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span id=\"Do-oils-help-your-eyelashes-grow?\"></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Do-oils-help-your-eyelashes-grow.3F\">Do oils help your eyelashes grow?</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Olive oil helps moisturize and condition your lashes. Dip a cotton swab into a bottle of pure olive oil. Wash and dry your lashes, then gently swipe the oil on, being careful not to get it in your eyes. Leave it on overnight and wash it off in the morning for soft, fuller-looking lashes.<sup id=\"_ref-3\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 3\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer#_note-3\">[3]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-2-Version-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Your Eyelashes Naturally Longer Step 2 Version 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/ef/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-2-Version-5.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-2-Version-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div></li> \n  <li>Castor oil can also moisturize and condition your lashes. Wash your eyelids and pat them dry with a towel. Dip a cotton swab or a clean mascara wand into the castor oil, then brush it onto your lashes. Leave the oil on overnight for healthy, thick lashes.<sup id=\"_ref-4\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 4\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer#_note-4\">[4]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-3-Version-6.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Your Eyelashes Naturally Longer Step 3 Version 6.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/12/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-3-Version-6.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-3-Version-6.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer&amp;action=edit&amp;section=4\" title=\"Edit section: How do you manually stimulate eyelash growth?\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span id=\"How-do-you-manually-stimulate-eyelash-growth?\"></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"How-do-you-manually-stimulate-eyelash-growth.3F\">How do you manually stimulate eyelash growth?</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Comb your eyelashes with a clean spoolie. Grab a spoolie, or a mascara wand, and wash it off with soap and water until it’s completely clean. Before you head to bed, brush through your lashes for a few minutes to promote blood flow to the area and (hopefully) make your lashes grow longer.<sup id=\"_ref-5\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 5\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer#_note-5\">[5]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-4-Version-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Your Eyelashes Naturally Longer Step 4 Version 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/ee/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-4-Version-5.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-4-Version-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div></li> \n  <li>Massage your eyelids. After you take your makeup off, put a warm washcloth over your eyelids for 1 to 2 minutes. Wash your hands and dab 1 to 2 drops of olive oil onto your fingertips. Gently massage your eyelids for 3 to 5 minutes, then wipe off the oil before washing your hands again.<sup id=\"_ref-6\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 6\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer#_note-6\">[6]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-5-Version-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Your Eyelashes Naturally Longer Step 5 Version 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/5a/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-5-Version-5.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-5-Version-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer&amp;action=edit&amp;section=5\" title=\"Edit section: What lifestyle changes can I make to grow my eyelashes?\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span id=\"What-lifestyle-changes-can-I-make-to-grow-my-eyelashes?\"></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"What-lifestyle-changes-can-I-make-to-grow-my-eyelashes.3F\">What lifestyle changes can I make to grow my eyelashes?</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Maintain a healthy diet. Not only will it improve your overall health, it will promote strong lashes that don’t break as easily. Focus on eating fruits, vegetables, and lean protein to get all the vitamins and minerals that you need for the day.<sup id=\"_ref-7\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 7\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer#_note-7\">[7]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-6-Version-4.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Your Eyelashes Naturally Longer Step 6 Version 4.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/58/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-6-Version-4.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-6-Version-4.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Salmon contains omega-3 fatty acids, which promote the growth of full, shiny hair.</li> \n    <li>Greek yogurt contains vitamin B5, which promotes blood flow and helps keep hair thick.</li> \n    <li>Spinach contains vitamin A, iron, beta carotene, folate, and vitamin C, which combine to give you strong, well-moisturized hair.</li> \n    <li>Citrus fruits and guava contain vitamin C, which prevents breakage.</li> \n    <li>Meats, iron-fortified cereals, and leafy greens will give you the iron you need to keep your hair growing.</li> \n    <li>Lean poultry and other sources of lean protein promote hair growth. When you’re not getting enough protein, your hair stops growing.</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer&amp;action=edit&amp;section=6\" title=\"Edit section: Does petroleum jelly make your eyelashes grow?\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span id=\"Does-petroleum-jelly-make-your-eyelashes-grow?\"></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Does-petroleum-jelly-make-your-eyelashes-grow.3F\">Does petroleum jelly make your eyelashes grow?</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>No, but it can make your eyelashes softer and stronger. Petroleum jelly is sometimes recommended as a treatment for eyelashes, and while it can help moisturize them, it probably won’t make them grow super long.<sup id=\"_ref-8\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 8\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer#_note-8\">[8]</a></sup> If you’d like to use petroleum jelly on your eyelashes, clean your eyelid area with a mild cleanser and pat it dry. Dip a cotton swab into the petroleum jelly and apply it to your lashes, being careful not to get it in your eye. Do this every night for the best results.<sup id=\"_ref-9\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 9\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer#_note-9\">[9]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-7-Version-3.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Your Eyelashes Naturally Longer Step 7 Version 3.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c4/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-7-Version-3.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-7-Version-3.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer&amp;action=edit&amp;section=7\" title=\"Edit section: How do I protect my lashes from breakage?\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span id=\"How-do-I-protect-my-lashes-from-breakage?\"></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"How-do-I-protect-my-lashes-from-breakage.3F\">How do I protect my lashes from breakage?</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Don’t pull or tug on your lashes. For the most part, you should try to touch your lashes as little as possible throughout the day. Pulling on them can really cause breakage, and it might make your eyelashes look a little thin.<sup id=\"_ref-10\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 10\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer#_note-10\">[10]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-8-Version-4.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Your Eyelashes Naturally Longer Step 8 Version 4.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/1a/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-8-Version-4.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-8-Version-4.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div></li> \n  <li>Curl your lashes carefully. If you like to curl your lashes, gently place an eyelash curler on top of your lashes as close to your lash line as you can. Squeeze the curler shut, but don’t pump the curler—that can damage your eyelashes and make them prone to breakage. When you’re done squeezing, move halfway down your lashes and squeeze the curler again.<sup id=\"_ref-11\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 11\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer#_note-11\">[11]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-9-Version-4.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Your Eyelashes Naturally Longer Step 9 Version 4.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/9a/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-9-Version-4.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-9-Version-4.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div></li> \n  <li>Take your makeup off every night. Before you go to sleep, use a gentle makeup remover to wipe off any mascara and eyeshadow you might be wearing. Follow up with a mild facial cleanser, then pat your skin dry. Leaving mascara on for too long can leave your eyelashes feeling dry and brittle, so it’s important to do this every night.<sup id=\"_ref-12\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 12\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer#_note-12\">[12]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-10-Version-3.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Your Eyelashes Naturally Longer Step 10 Version 3.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d7/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-10-Version-3.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-10-Version-3.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>If you wear false lashes, be sure to clean them with a mild cleanser each time you wear them.<sup id=\"_ref-13\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 13\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer#_note-13\">[13]</a></sup></li> \n    <li>If you get lash lifts, make sure you're using a lash conditioner daily.<sup id=\"_ref-14\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 14\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer#_note-14\">[14]</a></sup></li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer&amp;action=edit&amp;section=8\" title=\"Edit section: Video\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Video\">Video</span></h2> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer&amp;action=edit&amp;section=9\" title=\"Edit section: Tips\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Tips\">Tips</span></h2> \n <ul>\n  <li>There are many serums on the market that claim to boost lash growth. It’s worthwhile to read online reviews before purchasing one, as not all of them work equally well, and some may even cause irritation or allergic reactions.</li> \n  <li>Most of these methods will take at least a month to work. Use them consistently for the best results.</li> \n  <li>While coconut oil and green tea are sometimes recommended for eyelash growth, olive oil and castor oil are better choices.</li>\n </ul> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer&amp;action=edit&amp;section=10\" title=\"Edit section: Warnings\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Warnings\">Warnings</span></h2> \n <ul>\n  <li>Eyes and the skin around them are sensitive. If you experience any irritation from any of the treatments you’re putting on your lashes, stop using them immediately.</li> \n  <li>If you suffer from styes or any other eyelid-related issues, be extra careful about what you use on your eyelids and lashes.</li>\n </ul> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer&amp;action=edit&amp;section=11\" title=\"Edit section: Related wikiHows\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Related-wikiHows\">Related wikiHows</span></h2> \n <ul>\n  <li><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Curl-Your-Eyelashes\" title=\"Curl Your Eyelashes\">Curl Your Eyelashes</a></li> \n  <li><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Get-Perfect-Eyelashes\" title=\"Get Perfect Eyelashes\">Get Perfect Eyelashes</a></li> \n  <li><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Grow-Longer,-Stronger,-and-Healthier-Eyelashes\" title=\"Grow Longer, Stronger, and Healthier Eyelashes\">Grow Longer, Stronger, and Healthier Eyelashes</a></li>\n </ul> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer&amp;action=edit&amp;section=12\" title=\"Edit section: References\">Edit</a><span href=\"https://www.consumerhealthdigest.com/eyelash-care/does-vaseline-makes-eyelashes-longer.html\">https://www.consumerhealthdigest.com/eyelash-care/does-vaseline-makes-eyelashes-longer.html</a></span> </li> \n   <li id=\"_note-10\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer#_ref-10\">↑</a> <span class=\"reference-text\"><a target=\"_blank\" \n  </ol>\n </div> \n</div>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Sun, 08 Aug 2021 08:00:00 +0000","feedId":44,"bgimg":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/80/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-1-Version-5.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-1-Version-5.jpg","linkMd5":"c84fc7acc428c7e7a4602585c6fa1f1d","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn7@2020_6/2021/08/15/03-53-10-494_68859cda2b3de75c.webp","destWidth":728,"destHeight":546,"sourceBytes":31576,"destBytes":16818,"author":"","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/80/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-1-Version-5.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-1-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn7@2020_6/2021/08/15/03-53-10-494_68859cda2b3de75c.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/ef/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-2-Version-5.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-2-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn34@2020_4/2021/08/15/03-53-32-412_c1deba909064eafd.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/12/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-3-Version-6.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-3-Version-6.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn75@2020_1/2021/08/15/03-53-29-504_d2418619e056e471.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/ee/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-4-Version-5.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-4-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn89@2020_6/2021/08/15/03-53-30-571_8424ee0e5bd9727c.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/5a/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-5-Version-5.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-5-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn70@2020_2/2021/08/15/03-53-29-201_0ad059419f16b6c7.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/58/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-6-Version-4.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-6-Version-4.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn58@2020_1/2021/08/15/03-53-40-745_bfd33358d7a6b61c.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c4/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-7-Version-3.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-7-Version-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn2@2020_1/2021/08/15/03-53-30-786_0187bc72698c9272.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/1a/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-8-Version-4.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-8-Version-4.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn74@2020_3/2021/08/15/03-53-29-600_2c55cc8365bb8182.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/9a/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-9-Version-4.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-9-Version-4.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn66@2020_4/2021/08/15/03-53-42-131_ba9e7acc0d440b79.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d7/Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-10-Version-3.jpg/aid527187-v4-728px-Make-Your-Eyelashes-Naturally-Longer-Step-10-Version-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn70@2020_4/2021/08/15/03-53-32-045_a3ff133de67a43da.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1628999590232},{"createdTime":"2021-08-15 11:53:10","updatedTime":"2021-08-15 11:53:10","title":"How to Express Anger in a Relationship","link":"https://www.wikihow.com/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship","description":"<div class=\"mw-parser-output\">\n <p>Though it's no fun, it's perfectly normal and even healthy to get angry when you're in a relationship. When you spend a lot of time with someone, conflicts come up, no matter how in love or happy you are. There's a lot of ways to let out your anger, and some are better than others. Read on for some tips on expressing your anger while maintaining a healthy, strong relationship. </p> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship&amp;action=edit&amp;section=1\" title=\"Edit section: Steps\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Steps\">Steps</span></h2> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship&amp;action=edit&amp;section=2\" title=\"Edit section: Give yourself some time to calm down.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Give-yourself-some-time-to-calm-down.\">Give yourself some time to calm down.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>It's easy to lash out in the heat of the moment. Take a moment to breathe. Go on a walk around the block. Meditate or watch an episode of a funny TV show. Regain control of your mind so it doesn't get carried away with anger.<sup id=\"_ref-1\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 1\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship#_note-1\">[1]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-1.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Express Anger in a Relationship Step 1.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/93/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-1.jpg/aid12661909-v4-728px-Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-1.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>By addressing the situation from a calmer mindset, you can figure out what's really upsetting you and determine the most respectful way to address it.</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship&amp;action=edit&amp;section=3\" title=\"Edit section: Clarify your feelings before expressing them.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Clarify-your-feelings-before-expressing-them.\">Clarify your feelings before expressing them.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Understand why you're angry before confronting your partner.<sup id=\"_ref-2\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 2\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship#_note-2\">[2]</a></sup> Write down why you're upset in a journal to understand your emotions. Read back what you wrote to look for signs or triggers that may have set you off.<sup id=\"_ref-3\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 3\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship#_note-3\">[3]</a></sup> You can also try venting to a trusted friend or family member to get a better handle on what may have angered you.\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-2.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Express Anger in a Relationship Step 2.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/73/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-2.jpg/aid12661909-v4-728px-Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-2.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Processing your emotions first helps you come to the conversation with a clear head. That way, you can be specific about what's upsetting you.</li> \n    <li>You may also realize that your anger is masking another underlying emotion, like hurt or rejection. If that's the case, share those feelings with your partner.<sup id=\"_ref-4\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 4\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship#_note-4\">[4]</a></sup></li> \n    <li>Sometimes, outside factors can impact how angry you feel, too—like being hungry, tired, or in pain.<sup id=\"_ref-5\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 5\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship#_note-5\">[5]</a></sup></li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship&amp;action=edit&amp;section=4\" title=\"Edit section: Tell them exactly what's on your mind.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span id=\"Tell-them-exactly-what's-on-your-mind.\"></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Tell-them-exactly-what.27s-on-your-mind.\">Tell them exactly what's on your mind.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Communicate your feelings in a direct, respectful way. It's nerve-wracking to confront someone, but it gives your partner a chance to understand your point of view and even remedy the situation. Tell your partner how you feel and be specific. Avoid being passive-aggressive or waiting for them to notice you're upset.<sup id=\"_ref-6\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 6\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship#_note-6\">[6]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-3.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Express Anger in a Relationship Step 3.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/77/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-3.jpg/aid12661909-v4-728px-Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-3.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Start the conversation with something like, \"I wanted to let you know that I was pretty hurt by what you said the other day.\"</li> \n    <li>Follow with specifics, like how their words made you feel. Maybe your partner was teasing you but what they said really stung. Try, \"I know you were kidding, but what you said made me feel pretty disrespected.\"</li> \n    <li>Try addressing the problem as soon as it comes up. That might help it from turning into full-blown anger.<sup id=\"_ref-7\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 7\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship#_note-7\">[7]</a></sup></li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship&amp;action=edit&amp;section=5\" title=\"Edit section: Use &quot;I&quot; statements to confront your partner.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span id=\"Use-&quot;I&quot;-statements-to-confront-your-partner.\"></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Use-.22I.22-statements-to-confront-your-partner.\">Use \"I\" statements to confront your partner.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>This helps you communicate your feelings without placing blame. Your partner may have messed up, but they'll understand better if you emphasize how their actions affected you. Try something like, \"I am a really sensitive person, so when you spoke to me using that tone, I was really hurt and upset.\"<sup id=\"_ref-8\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 8\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship#_note-8\">[8]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-4.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Express Anger in a Relationship Step 4.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/2b/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-4.jpg/aid12661909-v4-728px-Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-4.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>As tempting as it may be to yell or demean your partner, try to remain cool, calm, and collected. It'll get your point across more effectively and will minimize the damage the conflict could cause to your relationship.</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship&amp;action=edit&amp;section=6\" title=\"Edit section: Use a calm, compassionate tone of voice.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span id=\"Use-a-calm,-compassionate-tone-of-voice.\"></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Use-a-calm.2C-compassionate-tone-of-voice.\">Use a calm, compassionate tone of voice.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Yelling and sarcasm can really hurt your partner's feelings. Even if you're angry, use a gentle tone of voice so that your partner can hear your words without getting defensive or hurt themselves. If you find yourself tempted to shout at your partner, try your best to exhibit self-control and communicate your feelings gracefully. It's hard work, but it helps you both get through the conflict with your love and respect for each other intact.<sup id=\"_ref-9\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 9\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship#_note-9\">[9]</a></sup> \n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Express Anger in a Relationship Step 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c6/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-5.jpg/aid12661909-v4-728px-Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship&amp;action=edit&amp;section=7\" title=\"Edit section: Listen to your partner's point of view.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span id=\"Listen-to-your-partner's-point-of-view.\"></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Listen-to-your-partner.27s-point-of-view.\">Listen to your partner's point of view.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Give your partner a chance to share their perspective. After sharing your feelings, ask your partner what they're thinking. Give them a chance to speak and really listen to them. Make eye contact while they speak and don't interrupt them.<sup id=\"_ref-10\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 10\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship#_note-10\">[10]</a></sup> Remember that relationships involve give and take. To work things out, listen to each other's points of view even when they differ.<sup id=\"_ref-11\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 11\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship#_note-11\">[11]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-6.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Express Anger in a Relationship Step 6.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/51/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-6.jpg/aid12661909-v4-728px-Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-6.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Talking to your partner about their perspective helps you get closer to a mutual understanding. Maybe your anger is the result of a misunderstanding, or perhaps your partner made a mistake that they would really like to rectify.<sup id=\"_ref-12\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 12\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship#_note-12\">[12]</a></sup></li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship&amp;action=edit&amp;section=8\" title=\"Edit section: Empathize with their perspective.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Empathize-with-their-perspective.\">Empathize with their perspective.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>You can be compassionate and angry at the same time. Yes, maybe your partner really messed up when they snapped at you. That isn't excusable, but it could help you feel better if you understand what caused them to behave that way. Maybe they had a bad day or they're stressed out because of work. Understanding what's behind their behavior can help you take their actions a little less personally.<sup id=\"_ref-13\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 13\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship#_note-13\">[13]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-7.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Express Anger in a Relationship Step 7.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/55/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-7.jpg/aid12661909-v4-728px-Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-7.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>This doesn't mean you should ignore how you feel; your anger is still valid.</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship&amp;action=edit&amp;section=9\" title=\"Edit section: Work together to find a compromise.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Work-together-to-find-a-compromise.\">Work together to find a compromise.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Decide what will work best to resolve your anger. It's hard to work past conflict, especially if you're pretty angry, but it's important for the relationship to continue. Work together to come up with a solution that works for both of you, like agreeing to consult each other before setting a date for big plans or events.<sup id=\"_ref-14\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 14\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship#_note-14\">[14]</a></sup> \n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-8.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Express Anger in a Relationship Step 8.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/0c/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-8.jpg/aid12661909-v4-728px-Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-8.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship&amp;action=edit&amp;section=10\" title=\"Edit section: Take a break if things get too heated.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Take-a-break-if-things-get-too-heated.\">Take a break if things get too heated.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Stop the argument mid-conversation if you have to. Take time to calm down and get away for a while.<sup id=\"_ref-15\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 15\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship#_note-15\">[15]</a></sup> Return to the conversation when you know you can express your feelings in a healthy way.<sup id=\"_ref-16\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 16\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship#_note-16\">[16]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-9.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Express Anger in a Relationship Step 9.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f1/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-9.jpg/aid12661909-v4-728px-Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-9.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Say something like, \"I need some space right now to cool off. Can we take a few minutes and come back to this?\"</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship&amp;action=edit&amp;section=11\" title=\"Edit section: Talk to a therapist if you're struggling.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span id=\"Talk-to-a-therapist-if-you're-struggling.\"></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Talk-to-a-therapist-if-you.27re-struggling.\">Talk to a therapist if you're struggling.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>It's okay to get outside help if you need it. A therapist or counselor can give you tools to express your anger in a healthy way. Search online for a mental health professional in your area or get a referral from your doctor. If your anger is hurting your relationship or quality of life, getting therapy is a courageous, meaningful step towards improving both.<sup id=\"_ref-17\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 17\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship#_note-17\">[17]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-10.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Express Anger in a Relationship Step 10.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/21/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-10.jpg/aid12661909-v4-728px-Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship-Step-10.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Anger issues can be a warning sign of mental health issues like depression, anxiety, or chronic stress.</li> \n    <li>Anger management classes can be a helpful too.</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship&amp;action=edit&amp;section=12\" title=\"Edit section: Tips\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Tips\">Tips</span></h2> \n <ul>\n  <li>If you or your partner engage in anger behaviors that make you feel unsafe, seek help. Use websites like <a target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer noopener\" class=\"external free\" href=\"https://www.thehotline.org/\">https://www.thehotline.org/</a> to find resources and support.</li>\n </ul> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship&amp;action=edit&amp;section=13\" title=\"Edit section: References\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"References\">References</span></h2>\n <div class=\"mw-references-wrap mw-references-columns\">\n  <ol class=\"references\"> \n   <li id=\"_note-1\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Express-Anger-in-a-Relationship#_ref-1\">↑</a> <span class=\"reference-text\"><a target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer noopener\" class=\"external free\"
